title: Leadership
intro: ValorForge Solutions is led by proven leadership with deep expertise in telecommunications, cybersecurity, IT modernization, and strategic consulting — combining decades of military service and Fortune 10 experience with enterprise-grade rigor.

leaders.name: Daryl Wilkerson
leaders.title: Managing Partner | Cybersecurity & IT Operations
leaders.paragraph1: Daryl Wilkerson is a technology and operations executive with over 20 years of experience leading enterprise-wide transformation across cybersecurity, IT infrastructure, and large-scale operations. A retired Navy Commander with 23 years of military service — including support of Operations Enduring Freedom and Iraqi Freedom — Daryl brings a rare combination of operational discipline, strategic vision, and technical depth. He has delivered over $1B in projected value through strategic execution and led organizations spanning hundreds of personnel across global operations.
leaders.paragraph2: During nearly two decades at a Fortune 10 telecommunications company, Daryl rose to Assistant Vice President of Cybersecurity and Director of Technology, overseeing enterprise identity access management, GenAI adoption strategy, and end-user computing for 200,000+ employees. He holds a U.S. patent in authentication technology, is a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, and is a certified SAFe Agilist.
leaders.paragraph3: Daryl founded ValorForge to bring that same standard of mission-critical execution to federal agencies and enterprise partners navigating complex IT, cybersecurity, and operational challenges.

seoDescription: Meet Daryl Wilkerson, Managing Partner of ValorForge Solutions. Retired Navy Commander and cybersecurity executive with 20+ years leading enterprise IT transformation.
